title: Enhanced photoelectrochemical hydrogen production via linked BiVO4 nanoparticles on anodic WO3 nanocoral structures
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01545A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Eunoak Park, JeongEun Yoo, Kiyoung Lee
In this study, heterostructured BiVO4/WO3 with linked BiVO4 nanoparticles and anodic WO3 nanocorals was fabricated. This heterostructure shows enhanced photoelectrochemical performances, especially, in H2 production.
